code: export var setLoginData=function setLoginData(token,tokenExpiredAt,photo){window.localStorage.token=token;window.localStorage.tokenExpiredAt=tokenExpiredAt;window.localStorage.photo=photo;};export var cleanLoginData=function cleanLoginData(){window.localStorage.removeItem('token');window.localStorage.removeItem('tokenExpiredAt');window.localStorage.removeItem('photo');};export var getLoginStatus=function getLoginStatus(){var login=false;var _window$localStorage=window.localStorage,token=_window$localStorage.token,tokenExpiredAt=_window$localStorage.tokenExpiredAt;var currentTime=new Date().getTime();var expireTime=new Date(tokenExpiredAt).getTime();if(token&&currentTime<=expireTime){login=true;}if(!login){cleanLoginData();}return login;};
